title: Drawing, "Design for A Council Chamber and The Citadel, for Othello", 1932
inscribed: Inscribed in white chalk, left margin: RAIL; under upper design: Part 1. Act I. Scene III; under lower design: Part 2. Act. II. Scene I.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Design for theater setting in orange, yellow and white. Arched doorways flanking main seating area with patterned walls. Two hole punches on left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for A Council Chamber and The Citadel, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-183.
